environment.NOTE: create within .env.local file (.env file is NOT IGNORED in VCS)
environment.REACT_APP_API_HOST: API host - must include port for dev env (localhost:8008), just public hostname / IP for prod
environment.REACT_APP_STRIPE_PUBLIC_KEY: public (client) key for Stripe payment processing
environment.REACT_APP_PAYLOAD_PUBLIC_KEY: public key for verification of JWT payloads issued by the API
